snippet.title: Fera: The Sundered Tribes - Official Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description: Take on massive beasts, explore the open world, and see aerial traversal in this latest trailer for Fera: The Sundered Tribes, an upcoming action RPG featuring village building and colony management. Fera: The Sundered Tribes will be available on PC in 2024.
